suncertify.network.rmi
Class RMIDatabaseAccess

java.lang.Object
  java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
      java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
          java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
              suncertify.network.rmi.RMIDatabaseAccess
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.rmi.Remote, DatabaseAccess, RemoteDatabaseAccess
public class RMIDatabaseAccess
extends java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
implements RemoteDatabaseAccess

The remote database access class. This class is the remote proxy that delegates all calls to a local database access instance.

See Also:

Method Detail

find

public int[] find(java.lang.String[] criteria)
           throws java.io.IOException
Searches the database for records that match the given criteria. Field n in the database file is described by criteria[n]. A null value in criteria[n] matches any field value. A non-null value in criteria[n] matches any field value that begins with criteria[n]. (For example, "Fred" matches "Fred" or "Freddy".

Specified by:
find in interface DatabaseAccess
Parameters:
criteria - The search criteria
Returns:
The array of found record numbers
Throws:
java.io.IOException - If an IO-error happens during execution
